marketplaces.name: claude-hacks
marketplaces.description: Skills, commands, and hacks for Claude Code.
marketplaces.repo_description: give claude code a set of hacks, not vibes :)

files..claude-plugin/marketplace.json:
{
  "name": "claude-hacks",
  "owner": {
    "name": "Mahid Alhan"
  },
  "description": "Skills, commands, and hacks for Claude Code.",
  "plugins": [
    {
      "name": "standup",
      "source": "./skills/standup",
      "description": "Get up to speed on any project. Analyzes git history, PRs, issues to brief you on current state and next steps.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "standup",
        "status",
        "briefing",
        "git",
        "productivity"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "exa-code-context",
      "source": "./skills/exa-code-context",
      "description": "Search billions of GitHub repos for real code examples using Exa API. Eliminates hallucinations with working patterns.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "code-search",
        "exa",
        "github",
        "examples",
        "patterns"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "architecture-introspector",
      "source": "./skills/architecture-introspector",
      "description": "Analyze codebase architecture using first-principles thinking. Understand structure and design decisions.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "architecture",
        "analysis",
        "first-principles",
        "design"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "explainer",
      "source": "./skills/explainer",
      "description": "Interactive teaching with chunked explanations and comprehension checks. For explaining code or concepts.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "learning",
        "teaching",
        "explanation",
        "education"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "threaded-explainer",
      "source": "./skills/threaded-explainer",
      "description": "Deep-dive explanations with nested topic threads. For complex subjects requiring progressive disclosure.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "learning",
        "teaching",
        "threads",
        "deep-dive"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "mermaid-diagrams",
      "source": "./skills/mermaid-diagrams",
      "description": "Generate publication-quality Mermaid diagrams for flowcharts, sequences, ERDs, and more.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "mermaid",
        "diagrams",
        "flowchart",
        "visualization"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "frontend-design",
      "source": "./skills/frontend-design",
      "description": "Design distinctive frontend UIs. Produces unique, non-generic interfaces.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "frontend",
        "ui",
        "design",
        "css"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "algorithmic-art",
      "source": "./skills/algorithmic-art",
      "description": "Create generative art using algorithms. SVG patterns, fractals, and procedural visuals.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "generative",
        "art",
        "svg",
        "procedural",
        "creative"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "ascii-art-explainer",
      "source": "./skills/ascii-art-explainer",
      "description": "Explain concepts using ASCII art visualizations. Terminal-friendly diagrams.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "ascii",
        "art",
        "visualization",
        "terminal"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "xml-context-engineering",
      "source": "./skills/xml-context-engineering",
      "description": "Structure LLM context with XML tags for maximum attention efficiency. For prompt engineering.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "xml",
        "context",
        "prompts",
        "attention",
        "llm"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "task-orchestrator",
      "source": "./skills/task-orchestrator",
      "description": "Plan complex multi-step tasks with dependency analysis and parallel execution batching.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "orchestration",
        "planning",
        "tasks",
        "dependencies"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "skill-creator",
      "source": "./skills/skill-creator",
      "description": "Create new Claude Code skills. Scaffolding and validation for skill development.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "meta",
        "skill",
        "development",
        "scaffolding"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "git-commit",
      "source": "./commands/git-commit",
      "description": "Create git commits for session changes. Analyzes work and drafts appropriate commit messages.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "git",
        "commit",
        "workflow"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "describe-pr",
      "source": "./commands/describe-pr",
      "description": "Generate pull request descriptions from branch changes.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "git",
        "pr",
        "pull-request",
        "workflow"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "handoff",
      "source": "./commands/handoff",
      "description": "Create and resume session handoffs for multi-session work continuity.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "handoff",
        "session",
        "continuity",
        "workflow"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "plan-code-changes",
      "source": "./commands/plan-code-changes",
      "description": "Plan implementation changes before coding. Structured approach to modifications.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "planning",
        "implementation",
        "code-changes"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "deslop",
      "source": "./commands/deslop",
      "description": "Remove slop and over-engineering from code. Simplify and clean up.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "refactor",
        "simplify",
        "cleanup",
        "quality"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "rich-simplicity",
      "source": "./commands/rich-simplicity",
      "description": "Apply Rich Hickey's Simple Made Easy principles to code review.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "simplicity",
        "review",
        "quality",
        "hickey"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "test-coverage",
      "source": "./commands/test-coverage",
      "description": "Analyze and improve test coverage for code changes.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "testing",
        "coverage",
        "quality"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "swift-concurrency-expert",
      "source": "./skills/swift-concurrency-expert",
      "description": "Swift Concurrency review and remediation for Swift 6.2+. Use when asked to review Swift Concurrency usage, improve concurrency compliance, or fix Swift concurrency compiler errors in a feature or file.",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": []
    },
    {
      "name": "ascii-explainer",
      "source": "./skills/ascii-explainer",
      "description": "Explains code, algorithms, system design using ASCII diagrams. Trigger phrases - \"explain visually\", \"I don't get it\", \"show me\", \"ascii diagram\", \"help me understand\". Produces diagram-first explanations ending with TL;DR tables.",
      "version": "1.0.1",
      "keywords": []
    },
    {
      "name": "publish-skill",
      "source": "./skills/publish-skill",
      "description": "Port skills from any project to the claude-hacks marketplace. Use when publishing or sharing skills.",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["publish", "marketplace", "port", "share"]
    },
    {
      "name": "icp-analysis",
      "source": "./skills/icp-analysis",
      "description": "Analyze a company to identify their Ideal Customer Profiles (ICPs) - buyer personas, verticals, and flexible tier structures (2-5+ tiers based on business model). Use when asked to analyze ICPs, identify target customers, or understand buyer profiles.",
      "version": "1.1.0",
      "keywords": ["icp", "sales", "leads", "buyer-persona", "targeting"]
    },
    {
      "name": "lead-enrichment",
      "source": "./skills/lead-enrichment",
      "description": "Find 5-10 key decision makers per company with verified emails using Parallel, Apollo, and MillionVerifier APIs. Use when asked to enrich leads, find decision makers, or get contacts for companies.",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["leads", "enrichment", "contacts", "email", "sales"]
    },
    {
      "name": "socratic-protocol",
      "source": "./commands/socratic-protocol",
      "description": "Socratic method for resolving ambiguity in planning, conflicts, or design decisions. Includes edge case/failure analysis with intensity scaling, contradiction detection, and learning capture.",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["planning", "socratic", "edge-cases", "failure-analysis", "ambiguity"]
    },
    {
      "name": "oracle",
      "source": "./agents/oracle",
      "description": "Strategic technical advisor for complex reasoning, architecture decisions, debugging after multiple failed attempts, and code review. Uses ULTRATHINK-level deep analysis with Opus model.",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["oracle", "architecture", "debugging", "advisor", "ultrathink", "opus"]
    },
    {
      "name": "communication-coach",
      "source": "./skills/communication-coach",
      "description": "PROACTIVE skill - Claude invokes automatically when user messages exhibit anti-patterns. Detects recursive nesting, scope creep, buried asks, assumed context, stream dumps, imprecise descriptions. Disable with 'coach off' or 'raw mode'.",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["proactive", "communication", "clarity", "anti-patterns", "coaching"]
    }
  ]
}
files.README.md:
# Claude Hacks

**Skills, commands, and hacks for Claude Code.**

Extend Claude Code with custom skills, slash commands, and utilities. Install what you need, skip what you don't.

---

## Hacks (Zero Install)

Standalone scripts. Copy once, use forever.

### Status Line

![Status Line Preview](assets/statusline-preview.png)

Custom status line: directory | model | context % | git status | cost

```bash
brew install jq
curl -o ~/.claude/statusline.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mahidalhan/claude-hacks/master/hacks/statusline.sh
chmod +x ~/.claude/statusline.sh
claude config set status_line.command ~/.claude/statusline.sh
```

### Publish Skill

Publish skills from any project to your own marketplace repo. Copies skill, bumps version, commits & pushes.

```bash
# Install
curl -o ~/.local/bin/publish-skill https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mahidalhan/claude-hacks/master/hacks/publish-skill
chmod +x ~/.local/bin/publish-skill

# Set your marketplace (add to .zshrc)
export CLAUDE_MARKETPLACE=~/code/my-marketplace

# Usage (from any project with .claude/skills/)
publish-skill my-skill                            # From .claude/skills/my-skill
publish-skill my-skill --source /path/to/skill    # Custom source
publish-skill my-skill --dry-run                  # Preview changes
```

---

## Plugins (Marketplace)

```bash
# Add marketplace (once)
/plugin marketplace add mahidalhan/claude-hacks

# Install any plugin
/plugin install <plugin-name>@claude-hacks
```

### code-intelligence
Code search and architecture analysis via Exa API (requires `EXA_API_KEY`).

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/code-search` | Search GitHub repos for real code examples |
| `/analyze-architecture` | First-principles architecture analysis |

Skills: `exa-code-context`, `architecture-introspector`

### learning-tools
Interactive teaching with chunked explanations and comprehension checks.

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/explain` | Recursive ground-up explanations |
| `/threaded-explainer` | Chunked explanations with interrupt handling |

Skills: `explainer`, `threaded-explainer`

### creative-tools
Diagrams, UI design, generative art, and visual explanations.

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/diagram` | Mermaid diagrams for any flow |
| `/design-ui` | Distinctive frontend designs |
| `/generative-art` | Algorithmic/generative art |
| `/ascii-explain` | ASCII art visualizations |

Skills: `mermaid-diagrams`, `frontend-design`, `algorithmic-art`, `ascii-art-explainer`

### workflow-tools
Session handoffs, planning, orchestration, and development workflows.

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/create-handoff` | Create session handoff document |
| `/resume-handoff` | Resume from handoff |
| `/orchestrate` | Multi-task orchestration |
| `/plan-code-changes` | Implementation planning |
| `/daily-standup` | Generate standup summary |
| `/deslop` | Remove AI slop from text |
| `/rich-simplicity` | Apply Simple Made Easy principles |
| `/test-coverage` | Analyze test coverage |
| `/xml-context` | Structure context with XML |

Skills: `task-orchestrator`, `xml-context-engineering`

### skill-tools
Create custom Claude skills with quality constraints.

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/create-skill` | Scaffold a new skill |

Skills: `skill-creator`

### git-tools
Smart commits and PR descriptions following best practices.

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/commit` | Generate semantic commit |
| `/describe-pr` | Generate PR description |

---

## Links

- [Claude Plugins Guide](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/plugins)
- [Exa API](https://docs.exa.ai/reference/context)

## License

MIT
